MR1 Tenth Anniversary Challenge!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Mayors Cup: Tournament Announcements: MR1 Tenth Anniversary Challenge!
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 29, 2007 - 06:43 pm:

In November 2007, date TBD, to honor the tenth anniversary of the release of Monster Rancher, we will be hosting the MRM Anniversary MR1 Challenge. This event will be a free-for-all, open to monsters of any age, rank, and stat composite.

Here are the detailed guidelines:

1) Monsters be any age.

2) Monsters may be from CDs, Market, or combination.

3) Techs are up to you.

4) Limit 3 entries per person.


Guidelines for Submission:

1) Entrants must follow all general tourney rules outlined in the main Coliseum Guidelines for Entrants. No one under 13 allowed to submit, no cheat devices, no wagering.

2) When you have your monster ready, email me at monster.rancher.metropolis(at)gmail.com requesting a save slot. I will reply and assign you a save slot. You will then need to make a save on that slot with your monster in the freezer and email the Dex Drive save to me, or snail-mail me your memory card. (I will return the card!)

3) The tourney will be held in the MRM chatroom, Master Rancher's Lodge #47, at a time to be announced later. We will also try to post some of the rounds on youtube.

4) Any questions about this event should be posted in the Locker Room thread about the Anniversary Challenge.
